46 template <class MenuType>
47 void CCommandTools::CreateMenu(const iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand& command, MenuType& result)
48 {
49  int prevGroupId = ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE;
50 
51  int childsCount = command.GetChildsCount();
52 
53  QMap<int, QActionGroup*> groups;
54 
55  for (int i = 0; i < childsCount; ++i){
56  QString text = command.text();
57  iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand* hierarchicalPtr = const_cast<iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand*>(
58  dynamic_cast<const iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand*>(command.GetChild(i)));
59 
60  if (hierarchicalPtr != NULL){
61  QString text2 = hierarchicalPtr->text();
62  int groupId = hierarchicalPtr->GetGroupId();
63  int flags = hierarchicalPtr->GetStaticFlags();
64 
65  if ((groupId != prevGroupId) && (prevGroupId != ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE)){
66  result.addSeparator();
67  }
68 
69  if (groupId != ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE){
70  prevGroupId = groupId;
71  }
72 
73  if (hierarchicalPtr->GetChildsCount() > 0){
74  QMenu* newMenuPtr = new QMenu(&result);
75  newMenuPtr->setTitle(hierarchicalPtr->GetName());
76 
77  CreateMenu<QMenu>(*hierarchicalPtr, *newMenuPtr);
78 
79  result.addMenu(newMenuPtr);
80  }
81  else if ((flags & ibase::ICommand::CF_GLOBAL_MENU) != 0){
82  if ((flags & ibase::ICommand::CF_EXCLUSIVE) != 0){
83  QActionGroup*& groupPtr = groups[hierarchicalPtr->GetGroupId()];
84  if (groupPtr == NULL){
85  groupPtr = new QActionGroup(&result);
86  groupPtr->setExclusive(true);
87  }
88 
89  groupPtr->addAction(hierarchicalPtr);
90  hierarchicalPtr->setCheckable(true);
91  }
92 
93  result.addAction(hierarchicalPtr);
94  }
95  }
96  }
97 }
98
